meanings.definition: A thick, smooth drink of fresh fruit pureed with milk, yogurt, or ice cream.
meanings.sent1: I love to start my day with a delicious smoothie.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a strawberry banana smoothie for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The tropical smoothie danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as refreshing as a fruity smoothie.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the smoothie made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: A person who has a smooth, charming manner.
meanings.sent1: The new student was a real smoothie, making friends easily.
meanings.sent2: He's such a smoothie, always knowing the right thing to say.
meanings.sent3: The smoothie at the party had everyone smiling.
meanings.sent4: Her smoothie personality was like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: His smoothie ways made everyone feel comfortable around him.
